home.headline: Your Trusted Partner in
home.description: Experience compassionate care through our integrated platform offering direct doctor communication, AI-powered consultations, and seamless healthcare management.

featured.title: Comprehensive Support for Your
featured.description: Empower your recovery with our integrated suite of support tools and resources, designed by healthcare professionals.

ai_assistant.title: AI Assistant
ai_assistant.description: Get 24/7 support with our AI Assistant and experience seamless conversational interaction.
ai_assistant.benefits: Enhance your user experience with instant responses and personalized assistance.

get_doctor.title: Get a Doctor
get_doctor.description: Search, book, and rate therapists to find the right support for your recovery journey.
get_doctor.benefits: Access personalized therapy options and foster a meaningful therapeutic relationship.

resources.title: Educational Resources
resources.description: Access a comprehensive library of articles, videos, and materials on addiction recovery.
resources.benefits: Expand your knowledge and gain insights to support your recovery journey.

recovery.title: Personalized Recovery
recovery.description: Customize your recovery journey based on individual assessments and needs.
recovery.benefits: Receive personalized recovery plans and support to achieve long-term wellness.

tracker.title: Habit Tracker
tracker.description: Monitor habits, identify triggers, and track progress to maintain positive behaviors.
tracker.benefits: Set goals and see improvement in daily habits to support your recovery goals.

quotes.title: Inspirational Quotes
quotes.description: "The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step."
quotes.benefits: Find motivation and encouragement to stay strong on your journey to recovery.

coming_soon.title: Coming Soon: Enhanced Support Features
coming_soon.description: We're constantly evolving to better serve your recovery needs

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Track your progress, set goals, and visualize data for continuous improvement.
dashboard.benefits: Monitor trends and celebrate achievements along your journey to recovery.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Connect with others on a similar journey, share experiences, and find encouragement.
community.benefits: Build a supportive network and access resources that inspire growth and recovery.

crisis.title: Crisis Support
crisis.description: Access emergency contact options and immediate chat support with licensed counselors.
crisis.benefits: Receive compassionate assistance and guidance during critical times.

about.description1: CoClinic is an innovative telehealth platform designed to provide seamless healthcare services through live consultations and interactive AI support. We focus on enhancing the patient experience by offering multiple avenues for interaction, including direct communication with doctors and AI-based chatbots for preliminary consultations.
about.description2: Our mission is to bridge the gap between patients and healthcare professionals, making healthcare accessible and convenient for everyone. Whether you need a quick consultation or in-depth medical advice, CoClinic is here to support you at every step.
